title: Methodology Pipeline
justification: Selected by template 'methodology_pipeline' based on required sections and trigger rules.

source_spans.quote:
# Sample Paper

## 1 Methodology
We propose a three-stage pipeline: preprocess data, encode observations, and decode outputs.
The method uses attention and residual links.

## 2 System Architecture
The system has four modules: parser, planner, generator, and critic.
Data flows from parser to planner
